bridge-type.label: Jellyfin Server
bridge-type.description: Represents a running Jellyfin server instance

parameter.name: serverName
parameter.label: Server Name
parameter.description: Human-readable name for the server (auto-discovered from server if not set)

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname/IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the server

parameter.name: refreshSeconds
parameter.label: Refresh Seconds
parameter.description: Interval to pull devices state from the server

parameter.name: clientActiveWithInSeconds
parameter.label: Client Active Timeout
parameter.description: Amount off seconds allowed since the last client activity to assert it's online (0 disabled)
